website_summaries.verdict: Aids in healing chronic pain, especially back pain, and also helps ease daily stress.
pros: Described as a miracle extract, helping ease the symptoms of inflammation to anxiety
Easy to apply and even works in small doses
Benefits of this extract are enhanced when combined with other holistic remedies
cons: Some reviews suggest this contains CBD, which it does not

customer_reviews.title: Thank You!!
customer_reviews.text: Been taking for my knee pain and inflammation. I can feel a HUGE difference in just a week!! Didn't get an immediate effect, but after a couple days I began to feel more mobility and much less pain. I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Beach

customer_reviews.title: New stamina and less pain meds!
customer_reviews.text: I will never be without this product in the future. I am 76 years old and I have had several surgeries which left me with no stamina and very little energy. I cannot tell you what a difference it has made in my life. In addition I have been able to reduce my strong pain medicine from three tablets a day down to one or two daily. That in itself is a marvel.
customer_reviews.author: Judith P.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with anxiety and pain
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because I have Multiple Sclerosis and anxiety. It definitely relaxes me and helps my anxiety a great deal! It helps the pain a bit, depends on the day, how much I take, if I’m having a flare up or not. I highly recommend this product. When I take it within 5 minutes..I am so relaxed I don’t have a care in the world. Which is nice when you live with chronic pain and anxiety. Other CBD oil products even medical grade ones I’ve tried don’t do that, and this one does! It’s also very affordable! Make sure you shake it before each use. I take a half dropper in the morning and at night.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Barrand

customer_reviews.title: I almost never have to take prescription pain medicine anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I had knee pain and back pain and was taking pain medicine. After reading many reviews I decided to try this product verses any of the others. I shake the bottle and put 3 drops under my tungue and let it sit there for 30 seconds or so in the morning. I do the same before bed and right away I noticed a difference. It's been about 2 months now and most days are pain free. It works really good for headaches too!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ethier

customer_reviews.title: Repeatly Purchase for pain support; It works! Repeat purchaser due to consistent quality + potency!
customer_reviews.text: Effective Pain management with results! Helps Me with muscular + nerve pains from spinal injury needing frequent pain solution due to my chronic pain syndrome from nerve pains. Highly recommended! Consistent high quality. Grateful I can afford this product because it works! Go on and get some!
customer_reviews.author: DynamicDavid.me

customer_reviews.title: Great facial product!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be CBD oil. Whoops, my bad. In addition to taking it orally, I have been using it on my fave at night. It smells funny but I’m sleeping anyway, so whatever. I have had comments lately that I couldn’t be my age and my skin is moisturized!
customer_reviews.author: S. Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first....
customer_reviews.text: I've read a lot about Hemp extract/CBD oil, etc and decided to give it a try....purchased this brand after reading reviews, etc and it doesn't disappoint! I used to take naproxen every day for my arthritis and haven't taken it now for 1 month since starting this hemp before bed....helps me to sleep better too! I am a RN and it is important to me try a product first before recommending it to others.....worth a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Matelan

customer_reviews.title: Crap.  Don’t even waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Started my poor old dog on Koi CBD oil and it did wonders, but probably not strong enough, so I ordered this one. What a load of trash: did nothing tk help my poor dog, so I tasted it and it’s just like nasty flavored olive oil. Come on Amazon...start checking out what you sell please! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: D. E.

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: seems pretty comparable to others in the category, but less expensive. If you want exact dosages, this does not have markings on the dropper for that.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Effective pain relief
customer_reviews.text: This product comes highly recommended for any type of pain management or insomnia. I especially enjoy the fresh minty flavor, the taste is much better than other brands I've tried. I reached out to the seller when there was a mixup with my order & they were more than accommodating which I appreciated. They're even going to send me a packet of their new gummies to try which I'm looking forward to:)
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Hemp oil does not affect your internal organs
customer_reviews.text: I've had serious lower back pain for years. It affected my activities, especially golf. Hemp oil eliminated the inflammation almost immediately after taking it. I'm now pain free after golf with no damage to my heart, kidneys or liver. I wish I had heard about this years ago.!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really helps pain, calming effect
customer_reviews.text: My Mother has been in suvere pain with a bulging disc and pinched nerve. She has tried everything! We had her try Hemp oil and she has finally found relief!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Kendrick, A.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for back pain.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT as good as the 1,000 mg product for my back pain. It took me so much time to find one that worked for me. I will not buy this again. If you ever return to offer the 1000 mg again, let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Larson

customer_reviews.title: Douse not have cbd iol in it
customer_reviews.text: Thought it had cbd oil in it no made me sick do not recommend😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Shannon WIBORG

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if it's working
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know if the product is working as I haven't discontinued all other pain meds.
customer_reviews.author: johncblacker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product/as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The NuRyse Hemp oil 1000mg is a quality product. It ships as advertised. It tastes great and helped with my pain and anxiety better than any other CBD product I have tried or used.
customer_reviews.author: stuart cerullo

customer_reviews.title: May work
customer_reviews.text: Works well for anxiety but idk if thats placebo effect
customer_reviews.author: Dan LaMorte

customer_reviews.title: didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find that it helped my arthritis at all. not sure if it is your specific product or CBD/Hemp oil in general
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped me so much. My pain has decreased 80%.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different product. NutriFlair works great and much cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancee for his pain and anxiety. For the amount of money i spent it should have done something. It didnt help the least little bit. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: sherry hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: works very well- I have been able to discontinue pain killers,which I have been taking for two years!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: CBD
customer_reviews.text: Hemp % much higher than most and price allows me to take it regularly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This really works, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a help, first relief for my low back pain in years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This cbd had no effect at all for joint pain or as a sleep aid.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Campi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to use, price is good, shipping is spot on, easy to order
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kipp

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helped
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helped out. I quit smoking cigarettes and used this when I started feeling angry. It helped to get through the cravings and not be angry.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N Mangione

customer_reviews.title: Helps w back pain!
customer_reviews.text: Just received our oil, and already love it. Noticeable difference in my back pain within 10 mins of taking it. Nice subtle mint taste.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne R Burgess

customer_reviews.title: It takes a  few weeks  to get  full affect.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for pain and anxiety. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cox

customer_reviews.title: Give CBD drops a try to see if you feel better
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both use these drops. I use them for inflammation in my joints. I really do think they are helping.
customer_reviews.author: Bette States

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product and good customer service they called me to make sure I was happy
customer_reviews.author: hank

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. The added peppermint is a nice added bonus compared to normal cbd oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The oil extract drops are easy to take and effective in relieving pain and anxiety
customer_reviews.text: The oil extract drops are easy to take and effective in relieving pain and anxiety. It was amazing that the benefits of the extract were felt within one day of beginning the drops.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I could feel relief and began feeling like I could play golf and do other household tasks ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased your NuRyse hemp oil product for help with shoulder pain, and began using it right away. After a couple days, I could feel relief and began feeling like I could play golf and do other household tasks with very little pain. It made a huge difference and I will be using your NuRyse hemp oil for the foreseeable future. Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lem

customer_reviews.title: Have been using for about two weeks now.
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe that I have been using it long enough yet to give a full rating for pain relief. However, I have Tinnits (ringing ears) and I think that the oil has made them ring worse. Now everyone is different and it may not even bother others so don't back out because of what my body does. It is not "instant relief" for me. I have fibromyalgia and am always in pain, but the joint pain is different from the nerve pain so I do say that my knees and hips do feel a bit better so far. FYI, I am 67 years so take that into account too.
customer_reviews.author: LadyMaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Listen to your body To find optimal dosage
customer_reviews.text: Reduced prickly pain by 80% after experimenting with dosage amount that was optimal for me. Quite different from MD's suggested Amt.
customer_reviews.author: carey

customer_reviews.title: It works for insomnia
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow, finally relief for not sleeping well. The 1st night I didn't get results. I was concerned. I've used it 2 more nights and it has been a huge relief to get some sleep. I take a full dropperful b4 bed. This along with simple basic exercise and no chocolate or caffeine or sugar at night helps me.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I find this product to work very well to relieve pain. It is easy to use and I notice no side effects. I like being able to use a natural product to relieve pain instead of chemicals. Thank you for producing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Goerling

customer_reviews.title: It really does work for me!!
customer_reviews.text: It seems to have help me calm down, first time I tried it, it worked......I would recommend it...I have had knee pain for some many years and it has helped with that too..
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Restful!
customer_reviews.text: Helps to relieve body aches and pains and also provides for a relaxing night’s sleep!
customer_reviews.author: That’s my Patty!

customer_reviews.title: Maybe...
customer_reviews.text: This might have helped with pain relief, but it was subtle. If this product was half the price, I'd still be taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Glunt

customer_reviews.title: Meh......
customer_reviews.text: I got zero pain relief but possibly a little more restful sleep. I was taking one eyedropper full a day.
customer_reviews.author: mntnmn

customer_reviews.title: products from Amazon are sent in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: good value for the money. Flavor was as expected. Did not notice any pain relief (Disappointed)
customer_reviews.author: Dale K Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Feel nothing really...
customer_reviews.text: Feel no different. Have had better CBD oils. Not sure what the hype is about this one. Was offered a refund so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item.
customer_reviews.text: It has a great taste and I am sure it will help'
customer_reviews.author: Fred R. Eisenhauer
